name: Pong (itch) (Mateusz Filipek)
description:
Details:

Simple Pong game based on example in Unreal Engine 4 course (link to course below). Besides basic gameplay offers some additional features, like AI vs AI matches.

Controls:

UP Arrow / W - Move paddle up.

DOWN Arrow / S - Move paddle down.

M - Open game menu, end player match and restart AI vs AI.

R - Respawn ball, temporary feature.
